channel.title: Miscellaneous on Fathy AR
channel.description: Recent content in Miscellaneous on Fathy AR

item.title: Choosing Between Cheatsheets and Snippets Sections: They Are Redundant(?)
item.description: I’ve been thinking about it for quite some time. That the existence of “Cheat sheets” and “Snippets” page type in this blog is redundant. It makes me feel like something is not right. I need to clear this up. So, do I need to pick one, or keep them both? I guess I’ll go for “cheat sheet” if I need to pick one. Here’s my argument. “Snippets” can be included in cheat sheets.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: At first, I didn’t know what to type in this very first post. But then I remembered a saying from an ad that I thought was inspiring and relevant to this post and just wanted to share that. So, here it is. “You don’t have to be amazing to start. But you need to start to be amazing.”
